snippet: LinkedIn, the online networking service, reported a first-quarter loss as it ramped up its investments in projects aimed at attracting more users on the lookout for better jobs and career advice.
abstract: LinkedIn reports first-quarter loss of $13.3 million, or 11 cents a share, down from earnings of $22.6 million, or 20 cents a share, in period one year earlier.
lead_paragraph: LinkedIn, the online networking service, reported a first-quarter loss as it ramped up its investments in projects aimed at attracting more users on the lookout for better jobs and career advice.

headline.main: LinkedIn Posts a Loss as Its Expenses Rise
headline.print_headline: LinkedIn Posts a Loss as Its Expenses Rise
